portal.name: BHRIGU
portal.statement: BHRIGU is a structural portal and gateway layer. It exposes services, access paths, and economic interfaces without touching analytical cores.

orion.statement: ORION Core is an isolated analytical engine. No UI, no governance, no economics.

cosmography.statement: Φ-Cosmography is a scientific and visual exploration layer, fully separated from DAO and economics.

frey.statement: Frey operates as the interaction and communication interface. No core authority.

dao.statement: DAO governs access and economics. It has zero control over ORION or Cosmography.

access.statement: Access is provided via direct email communication. No onboarding flows.
